title: Happy Birthday, You-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>You-san, Happy Birthday, nya!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Thank... Ah!? Ahaha, I can’t move if you hug me this tightly~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Oh, it’s just because I’m so happy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You’re happy because it’s my birthday?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Celebrating the birthdays of the people I love makes me happy, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, I think I get it. I also get pretty excited on everyone’s birthdays.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey, hey, did you hear? Today, Maki-chan’s gonna... ah.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Maki-chan’s gonna...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Um... She told me not to tell anyone, so it’s a secret...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh!? But now I’m interested~! You’d better tell me, or I’m gonna have to do this~! Tickle, tickle~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Wha–!? Hahahahaha! O-okay, I’ll tell you, nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
